scene = canvas(title="Rutherford Scattering", width=800, height=600, center=vector(0,0,0), background=color.black)
alpha = sphere(pos=vector(-0.5*L+r1,b,0), radius=r1, m=m1, q=q1, v=v0, color=c1, make_trail=True)
au = sphere(pos=vector(0,0,0), radius=r2, m=m2, q=q2, color=c2)

# arrows
v_alpha = arrow(pos=alpha.pos, axis=alpha.v*alpha.radius/2e8, color=color.cyan)
a_alpha = arrow(pos=alpha.pos, axis=alpha.v*alpha.radius/2e13, color=color.magenta)

E_curve = gcurve(color=color.blue)

while alpha.pos.x+alpha.radius < 0.5*L:
    rate(500)
    r = alpha.pos - au.pos

    alpha.pos += alpha.v*dt
    v_alpha.pos = a_alpha.pos = alpha.pos
    v_alpha.axis = alpha.v*alpha.radius/2e8
    a_alpha.axis = alpha.v*alpha.radius/2e13
    K = 0.5*alpha.m*mag2(alpha.v)
    U = k*alpha.q*au.q/mag(alpha.pos)
    E = K + U
    K_curve.plot(t, K)
    U_curve.plot(t, U)
    E_curve.plot(t, E)
    t += dt

from vpython import *

# parameters
r1, m1, q1, c1 = 0.4e-9, 4, 2, color.red
r2, m2, q2, c2 = 1.0e-9, 197, 79, color.yellow
v0, b, k, t, dt = vector(0,10e9,0), 1e-9, 9e9, 0, 1e-15
L = 40e-9

# animation
scene = canvas(title="Rutherford Scattering", width=800, height=600, center=vector(0,0,0), background=color.black)
alpha = sphere(pos=vector(-0.5*L+r1,b,0), radius=r1, m=m1, q=q1, v=v0, color=c1, make_trail=True)
au = sphere(pos=vector(0,0,0), radius=r2, m=m2, q=q2, color=c2)

# arrows
v_alpha = arrow(pos=alpha.pos, axis=alpha.v*alpha.radius/2e8, color=color.cyan)
a_alpha = arrow(pos=alpha.pos, axis=alpha.v*alpha.radius/2e13, color=color.magenta)

# chart
chart = graph(title='Energy - Time Plot', xtitle='t', ytitle='red: K, green: U, blue: E', fast=False)
K_curve = gcurve(color=color.red)
U_curve = gcurve(color=color.green)
E_curve = gcurve(color=color.blue)

while alpha.pos.x+alpha.radius < 0.5*L:
    rate(500)
    r = alpha.pos - au.pos
    F = k*alpha.q*au.q*norm(r)/r.mag2
    alpha.a = F/alpha.m
    alpha.v += alpha.a*dt
    alpha.pos += alpha.v*dt
    v_alpha.pos = a_alpha.pos = alpha.pos
    v_alpha.axis = alpha.v*alpha.radius/2e8
    a_alpha.axis = alpha.a*alpha.radius/2e13
    K = 0.5*alpha.m*alpha.v.mag2
    U = k*alpha.q*au.q/alpha.pos.mag
    E = K + U
    K_curve.plot(t, K)
    U_curve.plot(t, U)
    E_curve.plot(t, E)
    t += dt
